errors.error_description: The URL for the installation documentation contains an incorrect path segment ('install/installation.html' instead of 'install/index.html').
Used pip install with conda-specific --channel parameter which is invalid syntax
Added unnecessary pip dependencies (cmake, numpy, setuptools) when using conda pre-built binaries
correction_candidates: $ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools

$ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite
   $ conda install cmake numpy setuptools
$ pip install llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools
